entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
